room_title: Escape room "Mine Trap" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: Had a blast for a friend's birthday doing the mine room!! Jackson was an incredible game master, totally made the experience! Can't wait to come back and do a different room soon

room_title: Escape room "Mine Trap" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: We had a company outing at Escape Tactic and had a great time in the Amazon Survival and Mine Trap rooms. Both teams made it out, but it wasn't easy! They are a new facility but they put a lot into the environment of the rooms which we appreciated. Would recommend for other companies looking for a fun team-building activity!

room_title: Escape room "Mine Trap" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: Great escape room - Mine Trap was a lot of fun and with 14 seconds to spare, we escaped!
